TopicTitle: Xbox one achievements not unlocking (other than the bugged one)

Articles.Content:
Brand new player to this game, loving it, haven't run into any serious problems.  Being new, figured I'd explore the planets starting nearest the sun.  Couple frustrating days later, found out Moho wasn't a great place to learn the game.  But was getting the hang of it, so persevered, and Moho's kind of a breeze now.  I got the achievement for flyby of Moho, but I've done a contract to Moho and have landed on Moho several times, have even gotten the verification in game that I've done both things, but neither achievement pops.  Oddly mission to mun popped first time I landed on Moho.

 

Wondering since I did things kind of out of order, (mun mission, minmus mission not done, etc.) if that is screwing it up.  No big deal, but thanks.

Edited July 23, 2016 by andhe78
There's no real order, the detection seems to be broken, if you could document this on the Squad issue tracker it'd help.
